alert.note: Alert for Bristol Bay (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 08 at 3:13PM AKST until December 10 at 6:00PM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 6 PM AKST SATURDAY FROM NEW STUYAHOK WEST TOWARDS TOGIAK... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 TO 8 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...From New Stuyahok westward towards Togiak including Dillingham. * WHEN...From 3 AM to 6 PM AKST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on difficult travel. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility to a half mile. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A frontal system will produce areas of snow mainly from New Stuyahok westward towards the Togiak area with 4 to 8 inches expected through Saturday evening. Gusty winds near the coast will produce areas of blowing snow with visibilities down to a half mile mainly from Dillingham and west towards Togiak. Snow is likely to continue into Sunday and perhaps Monday with more accumulating snow expected.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
